dataset_id: CENTURY: Modeling Ecosystem Responses to Climate Change, Version 4 (VEMAP 1995)
title: CENTURY: Modeling Ecosystem Responses to Climate Change, Version 4 (VEMAP 1995)
summary: The CENTURY model, Version 4, is a general model of plant-soil nutrient cycling that is being used to simulate carbon and nutrient dynamics for different types of ecosystems including grasslands, agricultural lands, forests and savannas. CENTURY is composed of a soil organic matter/ decomposition submodel, a water budget model, a grassland/crop submodel, a forest production submodel, and management and events scheduling functions.
